DOC.brief_summary: In this study the effect of tDCS intensity on motor performance and corticospinal (CS) excitability is evaluated. The investigators expect that a positive relationship between current intensity and motor performance/CS excitability.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of tDCS on Motor Performance and Cortical Excitability
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects Contraindications for tDCS/TMS TMS measurements have to be possible
